Posts.EditableText: Hi I have just uploaded the new 5.1.1 version of Quest and when I tried to load the game I am working on and the following error occured Failed to load game due to the folowing errors *Error:Error adding type 'defaultverb' to element 'wear'; No element 'default verb' of type 'ObjectType' Please can you tell me what has happened. Thanks in anticipation oh what the heck
Posts.HTML:
Hi I have just uploaded the new 5.1.1 version of Quest and when I tried to load the game I am working on and the following error occured
Failed to load game due to the folowing errors
*Error:Error adding type 'defaultverb' to element 'wear'; No element 'default verb' of type 'ObjectType'
Please can you tell me what has happened. Thanks in anticipation oh what the heck

Posts.EditableText: Can you attach your aslx file please?
Posts.HTML: Can you attach your aslx file please?

Posts.EditableText: Hi Alex thanks for looking at it. Is this the correct file?
Posts.HTML:
Hi Alex thanks for looking at it. Is this the correct file?
Dark Mirrors.aslx

You seem to have removed the core library reference. If open the file in a text editor you'll see these lines near the top:


  <include ref="English.aslx" />
  <include ref="CoreEditorObjectInventory.aslx" />


That should be:


  <include ref="English.aslx" />
  <include ref="Core.aslx" />


Probably a slip of the mouse when looking at the included libraries in the Editor?

Posts.EditableText: Where do you store your wings when they are not in use. Thanks a trillion Alex, I wondered what had gone wrong. I shouldn't mess with things I don't really understand. But now I've learned about a text editor You are an angel Thanks once again May you always walk with peace in your heart, and fortune in your step.
